StoredProcedureOraclev10g.name: TRANSLATE
StoredProcedureOraclev10g.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE procedure MESSAGE_OWNER.TRANSLATE (p_application_id in number
,p_language in varchar2
)
as
cursor c_met(b_language in varchar2)
is
select met.name
, met.translation
from message_translations met
where met.language = b_language
and not exists (select ''
from wwv_flow_messages$ mes
where mes.flow_id = b_application_id
and mes.name = met.name
)
;
begin
null;
end translate;
StoredProcedureOraclev10g.body:
CREATE OR REPLACE procedure MESSAGE_OWNER.TRANSLATE (p_application_id in number
,p_language in varchar2
)
as
cursor c_met(b_language in varchar2)
is
select met.name
, met.translation
from message_translations met
where met.language = b_language
and not exists (select ''
from wwv_flow_messages$ mes
where mes.flow_id = b_application_id
and mes.name = met.name
)
;
begin
null;
end translate;
